title: The closer a person is to an Imam the higher the reward? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner]   from Canada from what I heard that it's a the more 
the more close you are to the Imam the more reward   is but and then uh the thing is there's like this 
one brother I was talking to and he said there was   like like no Hadith about it or anything and he 
said that it could be an innovation and because   like I believe something that there was no Hadith

confused about it are you asking about physically   being close to the Imam while you're praying in
